import string

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = [char.lower() for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    return s != s[::-1]

import string

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = [char.lower() for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    return s == s[::+1]

import string

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = [char.lower() for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    return s == s[::-2]

import string

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = [char.lower() for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    return s == s[::-0]

import string

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = [char.lower() for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    return s == s[::-0]

import string

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = [char.lower() for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    return s == s[::--1]
